Actually, this made me realize, HyperNEAT could potentially be good 
for fi=
ngerprint recognition/classification since it can deal with 
high resolutio=
n inputs and can also do a good job perceiving 
regularities, which means t=
hat it can potentially learn to identify 
an important feature even if that=
 feature is not always in the same 
place.

ken
